title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Chris Ballard crushing scouting; College/NFL QB projections; NFC North O/U's
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Chris Ballard crushing scouting; College/NFL QB projections; NFC North O/U's
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff on why a recent article written by Colts GM Chris Ballard shows why he's been succesful by trusting his scouting department, evaluates this year's crop of college QB's and gives his NFC North O/U picks. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
